name: Perceive
description:
A simple puzzle game: move the boxes on the markers to complete the level, find the exit and repeat- but there's a catch! some boxes are unstable and can only been seen and interacted under certain circumstances! some levels are filled with deadly -or helpful- lasers!

But remember! When something doesn't add up close your eyes and Perceive... or just experiment a little more with your surroundings.

"Follow the light-eating beam to access a new reality..."

(this is my first game! I know that is lacking in the "artistic" department- but constructive feedback is always appreciated!)
